data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "In some schools, teachers are allowed to confiscate a student's phone if they use it during class time. Do you think this is a good idea or not? Explain your reasoning."
data.answer: I think it is a bad idea for teachers to take away phones from students in class. Because many students feel that it is against their rights for a teacher to confiscate their phones without permission. Many are also worried about their phones being stolen this way. Many teachers do not think it is wrong for phones to be taken up, but many also understand and do not want to be responsible for anyone who takes someone else’s phone. So it is clear that the right to confiscate a student's phone should be deprived. (94 words)
